changelog.name: v0.1.5
changelog.description:
**New Features**
- Status Column label text will now be white on darker colors

**Bug Fixes**
- Certain emails weren't allowed to signup (e.g. contact+me@tablane.net)
- Several inputs weren't able to confirm using Enter
- Status Column Popover was hidden behind the taskgroup title
- It wasn't possible to back out of the login page after trying to login from the landing page
- Editing the Space name wasn't possible under certain circumstances

changelog.name: v0.1.4
changelog.description:
**New Features**
- Task Drag and Dropping UX has been improved

**Bug Fixes**
- Deleting a subtask won't update to other devices
- Home page will only show scrollbars when necessary
- Deleting a task could result in additional tasks being deleted
- Long Space or Board names will not fully show (hovering over the name will show the entire name)

changelog.name: v0.1.3
changelog.description:
**New Features**
- Assigned tasks will now be shown on the "Home" page
- The task columns will now be visible inside the Task Modal
- People in the Person Columns are now animated inside when hovered

**Bug Fixes**
- Users were logged out after 24 hours
- Prevent unnecessary name change logs
- Person Column Popover will now only be loaded when user has permission
- Non functional Everything view button is now hidden
- Changes to the Task Name or Text Column value where not saved when closing the Task Modal

changelog.name: v0.1.2
changelog.description:
**New Features**

- Implement Realtime sync for Comments and Replies
- Add ability to update Username and Password
- Improved styling when editing task names

**Bug Fixes**

- Person Column won’t work on shared Boards
- Reply button also exists on replies
- Existing Collaborative Editing sessions won’t disconnect after closing task Modal
- Creating a new Column won’t show until a reload
- Converted Description and Comment placeholder from ‘Description or type ‘/’ for commands’ to ‘Type your Description’
- Text Column editable in shared Board
- Under special occasions, editing a Board name won’t work
- Status Column Popover, hidden behind Taskgroup title
- Comment / Reply editing save button is not visible

changelog.name: v0.1.1
changelog.description:
**New Features**
- PostHog user identification
- Removed unusable Like button on comments and replies
- Users will now keep logged in for 30 days
- Performance improvements for Task Lists

**Bug Fixes**

- Changing a Status Label to the same Label results in an Activity
- Renaming a Board won't update until a refresh
- Task name is not on top of the attributes
- Cannot type space character in a Status Label
- Pressing Enter doesn't save Status Label updates

changelog.name: v0.1.0
changelog.description:
Today we are launching Tablane 0.1.0!

We are bundling features like real-time sync, collaborative task editing, and instant updates into a unified tool that can handle pretty much all your team's knowledge needs – and this is just the beginning. 😉
